headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Karin Technical Custom
content: Your favorite hillbilly death truck is back and worse than ever. If you own a Karin Technical, you’re just a few steps away from the kind of mod options that’ll make a good ole boy weep hot diesel: once you’re hooked up with a Mobile Operations Center and an onboard Vehicle Workshop, and you’ve done the necessary research back at base, you can replace that rusty old 50 cal with a full-throated minigun, and stack on some brutal armor and ram-bar options.
